creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red, green, black on red and black warp; face:  red and green intersecting geometric shapes; reverse:  wide, red and black vertical stripes; yellow warp on both selvedges; some yellow woven crosses (face, same design) near one end; both ends neatly finished
title: Breast Cover
